product.title: gWoWEvents
product.description: An event signup system for World of Warcraft

code.installcode:
$db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ".TABLE_PREFIX."event ADD gwe_signup BOOL NOT NULL DEFAULT '0'");
$db->query_write(" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `".TABLE_PREFIX."gwowevents` ( `eventid` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `userid` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `date` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `changed` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `response` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', `comment` text NOT NULL, `armorydata` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', `locale` char(2) NOT NULL default '', `realmchar` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `realm` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `character` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `charurl` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `level` int(3) NOT NULL default '0', `title` varchar(25) NOT NULL default '', `faction` varchar(25) NOT NULL default '', `factionid` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', `gender` varchar(25) NOT NULL default '', `genderid` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', `race` varchar(25) NOT NULL default '', `raceid` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', `class` varchar(25) NOT NULL default '', `classid` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', `talentspec` varchar(10) NOT NULL default '', `talent1` int(3) NOT NULL default '0', `talent2` int(3) NOT NULL default '0', `talent3` int(3) NOT NULL default '0', `guild` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `guildurl` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `hp` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `mp` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `str` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `agi` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `sta` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `int` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `spi` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `arm` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `strbase` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `agibase` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `stabase` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `intbase` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `spibase` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `armbase` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `prof1` varchar(25) NOT NULL default '', `skill1` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `prof2` varchar(25) NOT NULL default '', `skill2` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `cooking` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `firstaid` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `fishing` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', `riding` int(10) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`eventid`,`userid`) ) ");

$db->query_write(" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `".TABLE_PREFIX."gwowevents_visitor` ( `eventid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `visitorid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `dateline` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `visible` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', PRIMARY KEY (`visitorid`,`eventid`), KEY `userid` (`eventid`,`visible`,`dateline`) ) ");

templates.template:
$vbphrase[gwe_total] $vbphrase[gwe_death_knight] $vbphrase[gwe_druid] $vbphrase[gwe_hunter] $vbphrase[gwe_mage] $vbphrase[gwe_paladin] $vbphrase[gwe_priest] $vbphrase[gwe_rogue] $vbphrase[gwe_shaman] $vbphrase[gwe_warlock] $vbphrase[gwe_warrior]
$attendeecount[yes] $attendeeclasscount[6] $attendeeclasscount[11] $attendeeclasscount[3] $attendeeclasscount[8] $attendeeclasscount[2] $attendeeclasscount[5] $attendeeclasscount[4] $attendeeclasscount[7] $attendeeclasscount[9] $attendeeclasscount[1]

$attendee_yes $attendee_late $attendee_maybe $attendee_no
$vbphrase[username] $vbphrase[gwe_character] Class $vbphrase[gwe_spec] Profession
$vbphrase[yes] $vbphrase[gwe_late] ($attendeecount[late])
$vbphrase[gwe_maybe] ($attendeecount[maybe])
$vbphrase[no] ($attendeecount[no])


$vbphrase[gwe_who_visited]
$visitorbits

$attendee[username] euwww.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?$attendee[charurl]" title="$attendee[guild]" target="_blank">$attendee[character] $attendee[level] $attendee[talent1]/$attendee[talent2]/$attendee[talent3] $attendee[hp] $attendee[mp] style="color: #1EFF00; cursor: help;">$attendee[str] style="color: #1EFF00; cursor: help;">$attendee[agi] style="color: #1EFF00; cursor: help;">$attendee[sta] style="color: #1EFF00; cursor: help;">$attendee[int] style="color: #1EFF00; cursor: help;">$attendee[spi] style="color: #1EFF00; cursor: help;">$attendee[arm] $attendee[skill1] $attendee[skill2] $attendee[cooking] $attendee[firstaid] $attendee[fishing] $attendee[riding] $attendee[character] $vbphrase[gwe_waiting] 13911">$attendee[comment]  $attendee[signup_date] $attendee[signup_time]

$vbphrase[gwe_attendance]
Signup for this event is no longer available. $vbphrase[gwe_advanced_x_days] $vbphrase[gwe_add_characters]

Error: $errormessage
$vbphrase[gwe_character]
$vbphrase[gwe_attendance]
checked />$vbphrase[yes] $vbphrase[gwe_ontime] checked />$vbphrase[yes] $vbphrase[gwe_late] checked />$vbphrase[gwe_maybe] checked />$vbphrase[no]
$vbphrase[gwe_comment]
$vbphrase[gwe_noauth]
$vbphrase[gllc_x_copy_x]

plugin.title: gWE: Add signups to Event Description
gWE: Add signup fields to table

phrasetype.name: Calendar
phrasetype.phrase: Add characters to your profile to signup for this event.
This event is not yet available for signup. Registration will be available {1} days prior to the start time for this event.
Will you be able to attend on {1}?
You are not authorized to sign up for this event.
Who has viewed this calendar event

phrasetype.name: Scheduled Tasks
phrasetype.phrase: Imports Armory data for gWoWEvents attendees.

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: How many days before an event may a user signup.
Allows users to signup with characters that are not listed as their first entry.
Allows users who can make but will be late signup for an event.
Allows users to maybe signup for an event.
Comma separated list of servers which are allowed to sign up for events.
Yes to enable alternates. No to disable alternates.
Set this to the maximum character length allowed for signup comments.
Set this to the minimum character length allowed for Late and Maybe signup comments.
Choose when signups should be disabled for an event.
Enter the field id number associated with the user profile field you created.
Enter US for United States and EU for European
This is the language in which the talent will be displayed.
Enable profession display in main table.
Enable basic skill display in main table.
Display who has viewed the calendar events.
This is the field that will be used to sort the member sign ups on the event attendance page.
What field should signups be sorted on?
Select Yes if you wish to delete signup data when uninstalling.
Usergroup ID's which can access the sign up form.
Enable links to skills, talents, etc. to Wiki
Url to the wiki you wish to use for linking

If you find this mod useful and would like to
make a donation, please click the PayPal link. Thank you :)
